message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a real game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $10000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really benefit from this product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $12500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11000, but that's my final offer. I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection, and I'm willing to make a serious offer.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to go up to $11000, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12500 and $11000. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11750. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love this product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11750 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11000, and that's my final offer. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're willing to go up to $11000, but I'm not willing to give up on the extra $250. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $11250. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love this product.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm really close to my budget limit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11250 and $11000, which is $11125. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
